name: Inversion Institute
description:
Inversion Institute is a visual novel/puzzle game set in a medieval fantasy world. Using Master Leo's recent invention, Magic Ink, you will draw working logical gizmos and contraptions to solve problems for the Institute and surrounding townsfolk.



With the help of other characters, you may even invent a machine that will change the world forever.

Key Features:

  • easy, intuitive, and compact "pixel logic" circuit simulator
  • puzzles motivated by engaging visual novel
  • multiple characters to meet and locations to visit
  • runs on Windows, Mac, and Linux
